label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Bans changed from 2/3 to 2/2/1
  • Picks changed from 3/2 to 2/2/1
  • Adjusted ban/pick/reserve times

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed increased from 300 to 310

label: Arc Warden
descriptionHtml:
• Magnetic FieldAoE decreased from 325 to 275
  • Tempest Doubleunit is now visible to the enemy players as the fake

label: Axe
descriptionHtml: • Counter Helixcooldown decreased from 0.65/0.6/0.55/0.5 to 0.55/0.5/0.45/0.4

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Ice Vortexcooldown decreased from 6 to 5
  • Ice Blastbase AoE increased from 225 to 275
  • Added Aghanim's Scepter
    • Ice Blast duration increased from 8/9/10 to 17

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Visiondecreased from 1800/800 to 1400/800
  • Flamebreakmana cost increased from 80/100/120/140 to 140

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml: • GreaterHawkinvisibility fade time decreased from 5 to 4

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Strygwyr'sThirstnow gives you bonus 3/4/5/6 armor when active
  • Bloodragedispels the target before applying its buff
    • This would cause it to remove things likeEthereal
  • Rupturedamage is now HP loss
    • This causes it to go throughMagic Immunitynow

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml: • Trackmana cost from 70/60/50 to 50

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Aghanim'sPrimal Splitunits now gain your current level ofDrunken Brawler
  • FirePanda no longer upgrades damage with Aghanim's Scepter
    • It has roughly same damage withDrunken Brawlernow

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml: • Quill Sprayhit memory increased from 10 to 14 seconds

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Incapacitating Bitemiss chance from 10/20/30/40% to 30/40/50/60%
  • Spawn Spiderlingsunit count increased from 1/2/3/3 to 1/2/3/4

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Added to Captains Mode

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml: • Strafecooldown decreased from 60/50/40/30 to 45/40/35/30

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml: • Power Cogsno longer knock backmagic immuneunits

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Arcane Auramana regen increased from 0.5/1/1.5/2 to 1/1.5/2/2.5
  • Freezing Fieldexplosion AoE increased from 215 to 230
  • Aghanim's Freezing Field's attack speed reduction aura increased from -20 to -50

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml: • Vacuumcooldown increased from 22 to 24

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• Shadow Wavetarget count increased from 3/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6
  • Shallow Gravecan now be cast on magic immune allies

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed decreased from 285 to 280
  • SilenceAoE increased from 200/275/350/350 to 350
  • Witchcraftmove speed bonus increased from 4/8/12/16% to 5/10/15/20%

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml:
• Thunder Strikefrom 3 strikes over 4 seconds to 4 strikes over 6 seconds
  • Thunder Strike damage per strike decreased from 50/75/100/125 to 40/60/80/100
  • Thunder Strike AoE increased from 200 to 240

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Doomnow disables Feast, Backtrack, Dispersion, Juxtapose, Bristleback and Blood Bath
  • Aghanim's Scepter upgrade duration reworked
    • Aghanim's Doom duration doesn't count down while the target is within 550 range of Doom himself

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml: • Corrosive Breathpassive from Level 1 Elder Form now carries over to Level 2 (the DPS)

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml: • Precision Auraincreased from 14/18/22/26% to 16/20/24/28%

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml:
• Turn rateimproved from 0.4 to 0.6
  • Fissurerange increased from 1200 to 1300
  • Echo Slamnow considers illusions as heroes
    • This affects Aghanim's Scepter upgrade as it does extra damage for each hero in the area

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Astral Spiritvision type from Flying to Ground
  • Natural Orderaura increased from 20/40/60/80% to 25/50/75/100%

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Flame GuardDPS increased from 30/35/40/45 to 30/40/50/60
  • Added to Captains Mode

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml: • Aghanim's Scepter bonus attack range increased from 165 to 190

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml: • Maleficescaling reworked

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml: • Flak Cannoncooldown increased from 20 to 30

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Base Strength increased by 3
  • Burning SpearsDPS increased from 4/8/12/16 to 5/10/15/20
  • Life BreakHP cost increased from 35/30/25% to 40/35/30%
  • Berserker's BloodReworked

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Alacritymana cost decreased from 100 to 75
  • Ghost Walkslow increased from 20/23/26/30/33/36/40 to 20/25/30/35/40/45/50
  • Ghost Walk cooldown decreased from 60 to 35
  • Tornadodamage rescaled from 70+(Wex+Quas)×20 to 70+(2×Wex+Quas)×15

label: Io
descriptionHtml:
• Spiritsno longer provide vision, except temporarily when they collide with an enemy hero
  • Overchargehp/mp cost increased from 3.5% to 4.5%

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml: • Omnislashno longer jumps on Tombestone Zombies

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml: • Base Strength decreased by 2

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Ghostshipdamage increased from 300/400/500 to 350/450/550
  • X Marks the Spotmana cost decreased from 80/90/100/110 to 80
  • X Marks The Spot vision from 1000 flying to 400 ground vision

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Duelbonus damage per victory increased from 10 to 10/14/18
  • Added to Captains Mode

label: Lich
descriptionHtml: • Chain Frostbounce count increased from 7 to 10

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml: • Open Woundscast range decreased from 600 to 200/300/400/500

label: Lina
descriptionHtml: • Attack range increased from 625 to 635

label: Lion
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Drainbreak and cast range improved by 100 (750/1100 ➜ 850/1200)
  • Aghanim'sFinger of DeathCD decreased from 160/100/40 to 100/60/20

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml:
• Spirit Bearnow has its HP drained byArmletwhen active
  • Spirit Bear bounty increased from 100 to 300

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml: • Armor increased by 1 (Shapeshifttotal armor is still the same as before)

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml: • Reverse Polaritydamage decreased from 150/225/300 to 50/125/200

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml: • Stone GazeReworked

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml: • Innate magic resistance increased from 25% to 35%

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml:
• Sacred Arrownow deals up to 100 extra damage based on distance the arrow traveled
  • Moonlight Shadowcooldown decreased from 160/140/120 to 140/120/100
  • Starstormwill choose a new target for the second star if the first died before impact

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml: • Base attack time improved from 1.7 to 1.6

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml: • Rip Tidecooldown rescaled from 19/16/13/10 to 10

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml:
• If a unit dies underReaper's Scythe, it will be credited to Necrolyte
  • Aghanim's Reaper's Scythe causesbuybackto be disabled on heroes it kills for that death

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml: • Hunter in the Nightattack speed rescaled from 30/45/60/75 to 45/55/65/75 (MS remains 20/25/30/35)

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• Mana Burndrain and damage decreased from 5x Int to 3.5/4/4.5/5x
  • Mana Burn mana cost rescaled from 130/120/110/100 to 100

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml: • IgniteDPS increased from 26/32/38/44 to 26/34/42/50

label: Omniknight
descriptionHtml:
• Added Aghanim's Scepter
    • Guardian AngelAoE becomes global and affectsbuildings(including regen)

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed increased from 310 to 315

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Blurlevel 4 evasion increased from 35% to 40%

label: Phantom Lancer
descriptionHtml: • Spirit Lance,Dopplewalk,Juxtapose, andPhantom Edgeillusions damage dealt decreased from 25% to 20%

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml: • Sun RayHP cost per second increased from 3% to 4%

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml: • Flesh Heapstrength bonus increased from 0.9/1.2/1.5/1.8 to 1/1.5/2/2.5

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml:
• Nether Blaststructure damage increased from 33% to 50%
  • Decrepifycan now targetTombstone

label: Razor
descriptionHtml:
• Eye of the Stormduration increased from 20/25/30 to 30
  • Eye of the Storm strike interval decreased from 0.75/0.65/0.55 to 0.7/0.6/0.5 (Aghanim's to 0.55/0.45/0.35)
  • Unstable Currentmovement speed bonus increased from 3/6/9/12% to 4/8/12/16%

label: Riki
descriptionHtml: • Permanent Invisibilityfade time decreased from 3/2.25/1.5 to 3/2/1

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:
• Invisibility fade delay when exitingSand Stormimproved from 0.3/0.6/0.9/1.5 to 1.5
  • Sand Storm now has a smoother damage interval (1➜0.5, total damage is the same)

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml:
• Base Intelligence decreased by 3
  • Shadow Poisonno longer gives vision over the targets with the debuff
    • This still reveals the projectile path, but no longer locks on vision to units with the debuff on them for 10 seconds

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml:
• Requiem of Soulsslow rescaled from 15/20/25% to 20%
  • Requiem of Souls damage reduction increased from 15/20/25% to 50%

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Aghanim'sMass Serpent Wardsdamage increased from 53-59/74-79/94-100 to 85-90/105-110/125-130
    • Basic version damage numbers also normalized a bit from 39-43/54-58/69-73 to 40-45/55-60/70-75

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml:
• Global Silencenow affectssleepingunits
  • Added Aghanim's Scepter for Silencer
    • Applies the current level ofCurse of the Silentto all units and increases ultimate duration by one second

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml:
• Bash of the Deepdamage type fromMagicaltoPhysical
  • Guardian Sprintcooldown decreased from 40 to 28

label: Sniper
descriptionHtml: • ShrapnelAoE increased from 360 to 400

label: Spirit Breaker
descriptionHtml:
• Charge of Darknesswill now alsoGreater Bashits target
    • Instead of only affecting those it runs through, it now also affects the target as well
    • The Greater Bash portion of Charge of Darkness will go through BKB, since Greater Bash goes through BKB

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Electric Vortexcooldown decreased from 20 to 21/20/19/18

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml:
• Conjure Imageillusion duration increased from 25 to 32
  • Sunderminimum HP exchange decreased from 33/28/23% to 25/20/15%

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml: • RavageAoE rescaled from 825/925/1025 to 1025

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml:
• Base Strength increased by 3
  • Int growth increased from 1.8 to 2.4
  • Chakraminitial mana cost rescaled from 125/150/175 to 75/125/175
  • Chakram move speed increased from 800 to 900

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml:
• Tosscooldown decreased from 10 to 9
  • You can now Toss units toRunes

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• Leech Seedslow increased from 24% to 28%
  • Leech Seed healing effect no longer ends when the target dies

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml:
• Battle Trancecooldown increased from 20 to 30
  • Battle Trance duration decreased from 10 to 7

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml: • Snowballcooldown decreased from 24 to 21

label: Undying
descriptionHtml: • Soul Ripcast range increased from 650 to 750

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml: • Fury Swipesduration increased from 6 to 15

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Strength increased from 16 + 2.3 to 18 + 2.6
  • Nether Swapcast range rescaled from 600/900/1200 to 650/925/1200

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml: • Poison Stingduration increased from 6/7/8/9 to 6/8/10/12

label: Viper
descriptionHtml:
• Corrosive Skinaffects any damage source not just regular attacks
  • Viper Strikeis no longer removed byDark PactorKraken Shell

label: Winter Wyvern
descriptionHtml:
• Intelligence growth increased from 2.4 to 3.1
  • Arctic Burnno longer provides flying vision

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Death Wardcast range rescaled from 300/350/400 to 400
  • Maledictcast range increased from 400 to 525

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Reincarnationslow now affects attack speed as well
  • Reincarnation slow happens immediately upon death rather than after reincarnating
  • Critical StrikeReworked

label: Armlet of Mordiggian
descriptionHtml: • HP regen decreased from 8 to 7

label: Assault Cuirass
descriptionHtml:
• Positive armor aura is no longer prevented from stacking with other items
    • This means that it works with items likeVladmir's Offering

label: Black King Bar
descriptionHtml:
• Magic Immunitynow has a 6th level of decrease
    • So it decreases on usage until it gets to 4 duration and 50 CD
    • Previously the lowest level was 5 duration and 55 CD

label: Blade Mail
descriptionHtml:
• Armor increased from 5 to 6
  • Damage Returncooldown decreased from 22 to 17

label: Blink Dagger
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown decreased from 14 to 12

label: Bloodstone
descriptionHtml:
• Initial charges increased from 6 to 8
  • Can be activated to instantly kill yourself
    • This will cause it to trigger the AoE heal that always happens when you die with Bloodstone
    • 300 second cooldown
    • Targets the ground to be used, to help prevent accidental usage

label: Bottle
descriptionHtml: • While empty, Bottle causescouriersto move 30% slower

label: Buckler
descriptionHtml: • Armor bonus AoE active increased from 700 to 750 (now equal to Mekansm's active)

label: Courier
descriptionHtml:
• Courier no longer block neutral creeps from spawning
  • Courier Speed Burst from 100% to 50% MS bonus (still reaches max speed)
    • This primarily a factor when carrying an Empty Bottle
    • Without an extra slow, Couriers will still reach maximum speed

label: Dagon
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost decreased from 1300 to 1250

label: Desolator
descriptionHtml: • Corruptionarmor reduction increased from 6 to 7

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 750 to 800

label: Dust of Appearance
descriptionHtml:
• Now stacks in inventory
  • Now slows heroes with an invisibility buff on them by 10%

label: Ethereal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Self or ally cast duration increased to 4 seconds

label: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed bonus increased from 30 to 35

label: Force Staff
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost decreased from 1000 to 900

label: Gem of True Sight
descriptionHtml:
• Gem can no longer be destroyed
  • Gold cost increased from 700 to 850

label: Headress
descriptionHtml: • Regeneration AuraAoE increased from 500 to 750 (now equal to Mekansm's active)

label: Linken's Sphere
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown decreased from 20 to 17

label: Medallion of Courage
descriptionHtml: • Cast range increased from 800 to 1000

label: Mekansm
descriptionHtml: • Mekansm AuraAoE increased from 500 to 750 (now equal to active)

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml:
• Warrior and Archer armor type changed from Heavy to Hero
    • This causes them to take a bit less damage from creeps, but same damage from heroes

label: Null Talisman
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost decreased from 145 to 135

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml: • Initial Stock now starts at 1 instead of 2 (max stock is still 2)

label: Quelling Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Can now target Observer or Sentry wards dealing 100 damage (wards have 200 hp)
  • Cast range increased from 100 to 350

label: Radiance
descriptionHtml: • Burn damage increased from 45 to 50

label: Sange and Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Minor changes to stats

label: Sentry Ward
descriptionHtml: • Sentry Wards AoE decreased from 950 to 800

label: Shadow Amulet
descriptionHtml: • Fade time decreased from 2.6 to 2.4

label: Shadow Blade
descriptionHtml: • Damage decreased from 30 to 22

label: Shiva's Guard
descriptionHtml:
• Shiva's Guard aura AoE decreased from 1000 to the standard 900
  • Shiva's Guard AS reduction increased from -30 to -40

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml: • DiscordAoE increased from 550 to 600
